question: The Tibetans are celebrating Losar Festival 2020 to welcome their new year 2147. What is the animal of this new year?
explanation: The Tibetans are celebrating Losar, the New Year of the community, from February 24 to 26, 2020. Losar is celebrated on the first through third days of the first lunar month. This year, they are welcoming Male Iron Rat / Mouse Year 2147 by offering prayers.
